description: Standard error types for the Kairo language

classes.name: BaseError
classes.description: Base class for all Kairo errors
classes.requirements: Must implement 'op as' and 'op panic' operators aside from constructors
classes.note: This is an abstract base class that all other error types inherit from

classes.name: NullValueError
classes.description: Error thrown when a null value is encountered where a valid value is expected

classes.name: RuntimeError
classes.description: Error thrown for general runtime errors

classes.name: StateMismatchError
classes.description: Error thrown when an object is in an incorrect state for the requested operation

classes.name: TypeMismatchError
classes.description: Error thrown when a type mismatch occurs
